title: Four Northeastern Governors Team Up on Vaping and Marijuana Standards
text:
The governors of New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Pennsylvania met to discuss vaping and the legalization of recreational marijuana in hopes of reaching a consensus on regional standards.

The governors, all Democrats, committed to working together to establish similar overall tax rates for cannabis products and setting common standards for how potent the drug can be, among other regulatory goals. Common rules across state lines would help with enforcement efforts, such as using the same process for roadside blood or saliva...
description: The Democratic governors of New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Pennsylvania met to discuss vaping and the legalization of recreational marijuana, committing to working on establishing similar tax rates.
